Selected Answer: C
Users store and manage knowledge using various external sources and search each source separately for relevant results. External content integration enables acquiring and searching all WebDAV-compliant source content from a single location. This provides users with a seamless search experience across multiple knowledge sources and drives more usage to the platform

Selected Answer: C
C is correct.

Before you import content, create and configure the connection between the a Web Distributed Authoring and Versioning (WebDAV) - compliant external knowledge source and the ServiceNow knowledge base into which you want to import content. Define import parameters for the external knowledge source.

Answer: C. WebDAV-compliant

Explanation: "External content integration enables acquiring and searching all WebDAV-compliant source content from a single location."

An Account Relationship is based on a defined account relationship hype. Users with the System Administrator role can define two types of relationships: (Choose two.)

"An account relationship type defines a relationship that can exist between accounts. Users with the system administrator role can define the following account relationship types:
- Account-to-account
- Partner-to-account"

partner-to-account
account-to-account

The Activate toggle switch for NLU is toggled on for all new Virtual Agent activations and the NLU Service Provider defaults to ServiceNow NLU. 
Source: https://docs.servicenow.com/bundle/utah-servicenow-platform/page/administer/virtual-agent/task/configure-nlu-settings.html

Selected Answer: AC
A and C

Selected Answer: CD
Enable NLU in Virtual Agent

To enable NLU in Virtual Agent, navigate to Virtual Agent > Conversation Flows. Click the Edit button next to the conversation flow that you want to enable NLU for. Scroll down to the NLU section and check the Enable NLU checkbox. Click Save.

In the NLU Settings configure the Intent confidence threshold

The Intent confidence threshold is the minimum score that an intent must have in order for NLU to match it to a user query. To configure the Intent confidence threshold, navigate to Virtual Agent > NLU Settings. Enter the desired Intent confidence threshold in the Intent confidence threshold field. Click Save.
https://docs.servicenow.com/en-US/bundle/vancouver-intelligent-experiences/page/administer/natural-language-understanding/concept/nlu-model-settings.html

questions.question_text: When the virtual agent plugin is installed NLU is activated but is not available for use until what two configurations are completed? (Choose two.)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: DE
Answer: 
 D. Install base item
 E. Sold product

Explanation: Service Entitlement form:
 - Name
 - Product
 - Account
 - Consumer
 - Contract
 - Asset
 - Active
 - Channel
 - Install Base Item (d.)
 - Sold Product (e.)
 - Business hours
 - Start date
 - End date
 - Total Units
 - Remaining Units
 - Unit
 - Per unit

Source: https://docs.servicenow.com/bundle/rome-customer-service-management/page/product/customer-service-management/task/c_CreateAnEntitlement.html
D E is correct, E book, if proactive plugin is installed, system could also look for Sold Product and Install base Item
